Package client

Class ProxyImpl

java.lang.Object
client.ProxyImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Proxy, climatemonitoring.core.Database
public class ProxyImpl extends Object implements Proxy
The proxy class is able to create the connection, closure and communication from the client to the server
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
francescolops

      Parameters:
      address - the address the user wants to connect to
      port - the port the user wants to connect to
      Returns:
      True if the connection was succesfull, false if not
      Throws:
      climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException - If the client loses connection during the operation

    • searchAreasByName

      public climatemonitoring.core.Area[] searchAreasByName(String str) throws climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException, climatemonitoring.core.DatabaseRequestException
      Returns in alphabetical order an array of areas which have a name that contains the input string. For example, if the given string is 'var' then the output would be an array like this: { "Varese", "Novarese", "Isola Dovarese", ... }
      Specified by:
      searchAreasByName in interface climatemonitoring.core.Database
      Parameters:
      str - The input string the search is based on
      Returns:
      The result of the search as an array of areas
      Throws:
      climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException - If the client loses connection during the operation
      climatemonitoring.core.DatabaseRequestException - If the database fails to process the given request

    • searchAreasByCountry

      public climatemonitoring.core.Area[] searchAreasByCountry(String str) throws climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException, climatemonitoring.core.DatabaseRequestException
      Returns in alphabetical order an array of areas which belong to the country whose name contains the input string
      Specified by:
      searchAreasByCountry in interface climatemonitoring.core.Database

    • searchAreasByCoords

      public climatemonitoring.core.Area[] searchAreasByCoords(double latitude, double longitude) throws climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException, climatemonitoring.core.DatabaseRequestException
      Returns in alphabetical order an array of areas which can be found around the specified coordinates. The around is about 0.5 degrees for both latitude and longitude
      Specified by:
      searchAreasByCoords in interface climatemonitoring.core.Database
      Parameters:
      latitude - Value between -90 and 90
      longitude - Value between -180 and 180
      Returns:
      The result of the search as an array of areas
      Throws:
      climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException - If the client loses connection during the operation
      climatemonitoring.core.DatabaseRequestException - If the database fails to process the given request

    • searchCentersByName

      public climatemonitoring.core.Center[] searchCentersByName(String str) throws climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException, climatemonitoring.core.DatabaseRequestException
      Returns in alphabetical order an array of centers which have a name that contains the input string For example, if the given string is "var" then the output would be an array like this: { "Centro di Varese", "Centro di Novarese", "Centro di Isola Dovarese", ... }
      Specified by:
      searchCentersByName in interface climatemonitoring.core.Database

    • validateCredentials

      public climatemonitoring.core.Operator validateCredentials(String user_id, String password) throws climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException, climatemonitoring.core.DatabaseRequestException
      Checks whether the userid and password are valid. If so, the corresponding operator will be returned, null otherwise
      Specified by:
      validateCredentials in interface climatemonitoring.core.Database
      Parameters:
      user_id - Operator's user id
      password - Operator's password
      Returns:
      The operator whose credentials correspond to the ones in input
      Throws:
      climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException - If the client loses connection during the operation
      climatemonitoring.core.DatabaseRequestException - If the database fails to process the given request

    • ping

      public long ping() throws climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException
      Sends a ping request.
      Specified by:
      ping in interface Proxy
      Returns:
      The time (in milliseconds) elapsed between sending the ping packet and receiving it from the server
